# vngcloud_vserver_flavor_zone (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "vngcloud_vserver_flavor_zone" "flavor_zone" {
    name = "DEV General v1 Instances"
    project_id = "pro-462803f3-6858-466f-bf05-df2b33faa360"
}
```
